column6:
"GOLDEN AGE" PART 2 (OF 4),2004,11
As if Daredevil's present wasn't bad enough, Daredevil's past now comes back to haunt him in a big way. In Golden Age, learn who was kingpin before The Kingpin. And what does he have to do with the legend of the White Tiger? Spanning the history of Marvel Comics, join the Eisner-nominated Bendis & Maleev for a 40th Anniversary celebration like no other!
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller (cover):Alex Maleev | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Dave Stewart
